column1: 46123974$Libromancer Geek Boy$$WIND$[Psychic/effect]$$$$$3$800$800$$$$You can reveal 1 Ritual Monster in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Libromancer" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Libromancer Geek Boy" once per turn.$$$$$
